title: Auxiliary function to get pose_cfg.yaml
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
I have to frequently modify the pose_cfg.yaml and it's always struck me as odd that there isn't an auxiliary function for it.

Several places in the deeplabcut code access the pose_cfg.yaml, each time they reconstruct it. Why not modularize it and make it more available to users?

e.g. in [auxiliaryfunctions.py#L575-L580](https://github.com/DeepLabCut/DeepLabCut/blob/444da3da70b1f3bfaae39b0849e0aafcff1a9b7a/deeplabcut/utils/auxiliaryfunctions.py#L575-L580)
```python
os.path.join(
    cfg["project_path"],
    str(GetModelFolder(trainFraction, shuffle, cfg, modelprefix=modelprefix)),
    "train",
    "pose_cfg.yaml",
)
```

**Describe the solution you'd like**
A new function in `auxiliaryfunctions.py` to get the pose_cfg.yaml file (ideally with an intuitive name like get_pose_config)

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
I have a snippet that does it, but I always lose it and have to go searching again. The frequency where its useful to change the pose_cfg makes me think others would benefit as well (eg. finding optimal augmentation parameters, changing learning rates, etc) 

**Additional context**
Some places I've found mention of the `pose_cfg.yaml` file (some appear tidy, others less so):
- https://github.com/DeepLabCut/DeepLabCut/blob/444da3da70b1f3bfaae39b0849e0aafcff1a9b7a/deeplabcut/utils/auxiliaryfunctions.py#L575-L580
- https://github.com/DeepLabCut/DeepLabCut/blob/34eb7f6042322d1af98afb487dbfd13b617d276f/examples/testscript_mobilenets.py#L27-L39
-  **Just found this, good solution? However un-intuitive name/location.** https://github.com/DeepLabCut/DeepLabCut/blob/6c3df66e901874371d2339bbccd968a07230fc77/examples/testscript_deterministicwithResNet152.py#L114
- https://github.com/DeepLabCut/DeepLabCut/blob/d7db8d36fdb95ad69f8d91f0a7877034cc81699b/examples/testscript_multianimal.py#L101
- https://github.com/DeepLabCut/DeepLabCut/blob/34eb7f6042322d1af98afb487dbfd13b617d276f/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_tensorflow/training.py#L38
- https://github.com/DeepLabCut/DeepLabCut/blob/d7db8d36fdb95ad69f8d91f0a7877034cc81699b/examples/testscript_multianimal.py#L101
